trans-unit.source: Represents an error condition when a rights management operation cannot complete successfully.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode"></xref>.
The failure code for the error.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given message.
A message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class and sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> store with information about the exception.
The object that holds the serialized data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode"></xref> and <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref>.
The failure code for the error.
The exception instance that caused the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode"></xref> and <xref href="System.Exception.Message"></xref>.
The failure code for the error.
A message that describes the error.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given <xref href="System.Exception.Message"></xref> and <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref>.
A message that describes the error.
The exception instance that caused this exception.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementException"></xref> class with a given <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode"></xref>, <xref href="System.Exception.Message"></xref> and <xref href="System.Exception.InnerException"></xref>.
The failure code for the error.
A message that describes the error.
The exception instance that caused the error.
Gets the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.RightsManagementFailureCode"></xref> for the error.
The failure code for the error.
Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> store with the parameter name and information about the exception.
The object that holds the serialized data.
The contextual information about the source or destination.
The info parameter is `null`.
